text: Nam'ma vacanagaḷannu dhikkarisuvavarannu khaṇḍitavāgiyū nāvu bahubēganē narakāgniyoḷage eseyaliddēve. (Alli) avaru śikṣeyannu saviyuttalē iralendu, avara carmavu bendu karagi hōdāga, nāvu adara badalige avarige hosa carmavannu toḍisuvevu. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanu pracaṇḍanū yuktivantanū āgiddāne
